rationale: This is a mutually beneficial blockbuster addressing primary needs. Team A sends its elite TE and a top RB to acquire a true WR1 in Metcalf and a high-volume RB in Cook, significantly upgrading its starting WR corps. Team B receives a massive upgrade at its weakest position with McBride and a top-5 projected RB in Kamara by dealing from its deep pool of WR and RB talent.
